title: Maana Madhura Lyrics Minsara Kanavu
stanzas: <div>Maana Madhura (Ooh La La La) Lyrics Minsara Kanavu

Maana madhura
maamara kilaiyile.
pachchakili onnu onnu
kaettadhu kaettadhu
kaelvi enna.

en kannu romba azhagaa
en rekka romba azhagaa
indha kaelvi enai kaetta
enna naan paaduven.

maetu saalaiyile
maattu vandiyilae
hey poraale ponnu oruthi.

ponnu kattiyadhu
enna pudavai endraen
vaanavillain vannam endraal

mazhaithuli mannil
vandhu sindha sindha
ezhugirathe oru vaasam.
adhu enai vaanavillil
kondu serthu vidugirathe
sila neram.

hoooo lalallaa o hoooo lalallaa
hoo lala lala la la la la la.

thanthaaney thanthaaney
kaatrum mazhaiyum thanthaaney
ellorum vazhaththaaney

thanthaaney thanthaaney
paadal ondru thanthaaney
ellorum paadathaaney

siru pillai pol
manam irundhaal
thuyar illaiye
paravaiyai pol
udal irundhaal
bayam illaiye.

thanthaaney thanthaaney
kaiyil boomi thanthaaney
valamodu vazhathaaney

mazhaithuli mannil
vandhu sindha sindha
ezhugirathe oru vaasam.
adhu enai vaanavillil
kondu serthu vidugirathe
sila neram.

hoooo lalallaa o hoooo lalallaa
hoo lala lala la la la la la.(2)

Maana madhura
maamara kilaiyile.
pachchakili onnu onnu
kaettadhu kaettadhu
kaelvi enna.

en kannu romba azhagaa
en rekka romba azhagaa
indha kaelvi enai kaetta
enna naan paaduven.

thanthaaney thanthaaney
unna kanigal thanthaaney
uyirellaam thiththithaeney

thanthaaney thanthaaney
paattu kuyil thanthaaney
sevi ellaam inbaththaeney

oligalile oaviyangal therikindrathe
manathiraiyil kaatchigalume
virikindrathe.

thanthaaney thanthaaney
mega koottam thanthaaney
idi ellaam thaazhamthaaney

mazhaithuli mannil
vandhu sindha sindha
ezhugirathe oru vaasam.
adhu enai vaanavillil
kondu serthu vidugirathe
sila neram.

hoooo lalallaa o hoooo lalallaa
hoo lala lala la la la la la.

Maana madhura
maamara kilaiyile.

hoooo lalallaa o hoooo lalallaa
hoo lala lala la la la la la.
pachakili pachakili pachakili

hoooo lalallaa o hoooo lalallaa
hoo lala lala la la la la la.(2)
